articles.title: What did people eat 5000 years ago? Ancient cauldrons give a hint - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: New research methods allow us to know what food was cooked in which pot during the Mykop period (3700-2900 BCE).
articles.content: New research into deposits found on seven different metal cauldrons dating as far back as 3700 BCE has shown that early populations of the Caucasian steppe during the Mykop period (3700-2900 BCE) con… [+1900 chars]
